charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pled guilty to Counts 1 &; 2 on April 2, 2003, Dft is to be imprisoned for a term of 60 months to run concurrently; Court recommends 500 hr drug treatment program, dft shall surrender to BOP as directed by US Marshall; dft shall be on supervised r elease for 5 years to run concurrently, dft shall comply with standard condition of supervision; in addition to: dft shall participate in approved treatment program for narcotic addition or drug or alcohol dependency, and shall be required to contrib ute to costs of services for treatment; dft shall not possess firearms or other dangerous weapons; dft shall seek and maintain employment; Dft is to pay a total assessment of $200.00 due immediately, with no fine or restitution imposed
